channel.title: [delta]: how do i add and change items in shops?explain please
channel.description: delta: how do i add and change items in shops?explain please

item.title: [delta]: how do i add and change items in shops?explain please
item.dc:creator: @shoopdawhoop shoopdawhoop
item.description:
@shoopdawhoop wrote:

since noone really explained, go to your CFG folder, and open up

Shops.Cfg

all shops should be in there heres an example

shop = 2	Auburys_Skiller_Shop				1	1	5509	100	5510	100	5514	100	5512	100	5605	100	590	100	317	10000	377	10000	383	10000	1265	100	1275	100	1351	100	1359	100	1623	50000	1621	50000	1619	50000	1617	50000	1631	50000	6571	100	1755	500	1739	500	1733	500	1734	50000	1753	5000	1751	5000	1749	5000	1747	5000

after the first 2 1’s look at the 5509
that represents the item ID
the number next to it represents the amount.
Example of how this would look :4151(item ID)(tab)5(item amount)
hope i’ve helped:)

Read full topic
item.source: [delta]: how do i add and change items in shops?explain please
